title: Saif Ali Khan Attacked News Updates: "Still Trying To Process...": Kareena Kapoor After Attack On Saif Ali Khan - NDTV
summary:
Kareena Kapoor Responds to Saif Ali Khan's Knife Attack

Publication Date: January 16, 2025

Source: NDTV

The attack on Bollywood actor Saif Ali Khan has left both friends and family in a state of shock. Kareena Kapoor Khan shared her struggles in processing the day’s traumatic events.

  • Saif Ali Khan was attacked at his residence in Mumbai, suffering six stab wounds.
  • He underwent a five-hour surgery and is reported to be out of danger.
  • Family and friends have rushed to his side at the hospital, expressing their support on social media.
  • Maharashtra Minister Ashish Shelar emphasized the need for ensuring the family's recovery from this trauma.
  • Police investigations are ongoing, with multiple teams set to apprehend the attacker.
  • Concerns over safety in Mumbai have been raised by various political figures following the incident.
“We are still trying to process the events that have unfolded.” — Kareena Kapoor

This incident not only highlights the increasing concern regarding celebrity safety but reflects broader issues of law and order in Mumbai.
newTitle: Kareena Kapoor Responds to Saif Ali Khan's Knife Attack

title: Saif Ali Khan Attacked News Live Updates: "Still Trying To Process...": Kareena Kapoor After Attack On Saif Ali Khan - NDTV
summary:
Saif Ali Khan Attacked News Updates: "Still Trying To Process...": Kareena Kapoor After Attack On Saif Ali Khan

Publication Date: January 16, 2025 | Source: NDTV

The news of the attack on Bollywood actor Saif Ali Khan has led his family and friends to rush to the hospital, offering support as he undergoes recovery after a surgery resulting from six stab wounds inflicted during an attack at his Mumbai home.

  • Saif underwent a five-hour surgery after the knife attack at his residence.
  • Family and friends, including Kareena Kapoor's cousin, Riddhima Kapoor Sahni, have shown their support through social media.
  • Maharashtra Minister Ashish Shelar visited the hospital and emphasized the need for the family to recover from the traumatic incident.
  • Filmmaker Kunal Kohli expressed concern for Saif's children who witnessed the incident.
  • CCTV footage is being examined by police as investigations continue to track down the attacker.
“It's a very shocking incident, a very sad incident.” - Kunal Kohli

The incident has generated significant public concern about safety in Mumbai, with several political figures commenting on the government's handling of law and order.
newTitle: Saif Ali Khan Attacked: Family and Friends Rally for Support

title: Kareena Kapoor breaks silence on attack on Saif Ali Khan: ‘Kindly respect our boundaries and give us space’ - Hindustan Times
summary:
Kareena Kapoor speaks out after attack on Saif Ali Khan: 'Respect our boundaries'

Date: January 16, 2025
Source: Hindustan Times

Kareena Kapoor has expressed her feelings regarding the recent attack on her husband Saif Ali Khan, who was stabbed during a burglary attempt at their home in Mumbai. She called for respect for their privacy during this difficult time.

  • Kareena responded to the attack on Saif, asking for boundaries and peace for her family.
  • She described the day as incredibly challenging and requested an end to relentless media scrutiny and speculation.
  • After her statement, several celebrities from the film industry showed their support, including Arjun Kapoor and Sonam Kapoor.
“It has been an incredibly challenging day for our family, and we are still trying to process the events that have unfolded,” Kareena stated.

The incident occurred early Thursday morning, and despite the serious nature of the attack, Saif is now stable after undergoing emergency surgery.
newTitle: Kareena Kapoor speaks out after attack on Saif Ali Khan: 'Respect our boundaries'

As promised, the makers of Ajith’s Vidaamuyarchi dropped the theatrical trailer online, and it looks stylish, featuring impressive action sequences and an interesting plot about the protagonist’s struggle for his lady love, who gets kidnapped on a road trip.

  • The movie is set to release on February 6, 2025, in Tamil and Telugu.
  • In Telugu, the film will be released under the name Pattudala.
  • Trisha stars as the leading lady in the film.
  • The cast includes Arjun Sarja, Regina Cassandra, Aarav, among others.
  • The film is produced by Subaskaran under the banner of Lyca Productions.
  • Anirudh Ravichander is composing the soundtrack.
“The trailer has set the right expectations.”

Initially planned for a Pongal 2025 release, the film is now positioned for a February debut.

Game Changer Box Office Collections: Ram Charan, Shankar film gross 158cr worldwide in six days - PINKVILLA
summary:
Game Changer Box Office Collections: Ram Charan, Shankar film gross 158cr worldwide in six days

Publication Date: January 16, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

The Ram Charan starrer has grossed another Rs. 26 crore approx internationally, taking its worldwide gross to over Rs. 150 crore, at Rs. 158 crore.

  • Accumulated Rs. 132 crore at the Indian box office in six days.
  • The film grossed over Rs. 5 crore in the Telugu states in a single day.
  • Six-day collections in the twin states are Rs. 82 crore approx.
  • The film had a strong opening with Rs. 58.50 crore on its first day.
  • Performance in Tamil Nadu was disappointing compared to expectations.

The Day Wise Box Office Collections of Game Changer in India are as follows:

  • Friday: Rs. 58.50 cr.
  • Saturday: Rs. 25.00 cr.
  • Sunday: Rs. 19.50 cr.
  • Monday: Rs. 9.50 cr.
  • Tuesday: Rs. 11.75 cr.
  • Wednesday: Rs. 7.75 cr.
  • Total: Rs. 132.00 cr.

The Territorial Breakdown for Box Office Collections of Game Changer in India is as follows:

  • AP/TS: Rs. 82.50 cr.
  • Nizam: Rs. 29.50 cr.
  • Ceded: Rs. 13.50 cr.
  • Andhra: Rs. 39.50 cr.
  • Karnataka: Rs. 8.50 cr.
  • Tamil Nadu: Rs. 8.00 cr.
  • Kerala: Rs. 0.50 cr.
  • Rest of India: Rs. 32.50 cr.
  • INDIA: Rs. 132.00 cr.

Despite a strong box office performance, the film's collection in Tamil Nadu has been underwhelming, expressing disappointment considering the director Shankar's reputation.
newTitle: Game Changer Box Office Collections: Ram Charan, Shankar film gross 158cr worldwide in six days

T.O.P Addresses His Current Relationship With BIGBANG Members - Koreaboo
summary:
T.O.P Addresses His Current Relationship With BIGBANG Members

Date: 6 hours ago

Source: Koreaboo

T.O.P gave a series of media interviews discussing his departure from BIGBANG after years of wanting to leave to prevent causing further damage.

  • T.O.P acknowledged causing harm to BIGBANG and his former company due to past mistakes.
  • He expressed a desire to avoid further harm to members by leaving the group.
  • His comments indicate he feels guilty and has been out of contact with fellow members since leaving.
  • T.O.P also shared pain over fans' expectations for a reunion.
  • He described his departure as a choice driven by his guilt.

“I left by choice because of how guilty I felt. So when I see messages from fans wanting a reunion... it feels like looking at photos of a family I lost.” - T.O.P

T.O.P's commentary reflects the emotional impact of his departure and highlights ongoing feelings of remorse.
newTitle: T.O.P Discusses His Departure from BIGBANG and Relationship with Members

T.O.P Addresses The Scathing Criticism For His Acting In "Squid Game - Koreaboo
summary:
T.O.P Addresses The Scathing Criticism For His Acting In 'Squid Game'

Date: 4 hours ago | Source: koreaboo.com

On January 15, former BIGBANG member T.O.P gave his first media interview in eleven years, addressing criticism he received for his performance in the Netflix series 'Squid Game 2'.

  • T.O.P portrayed Thanos, a rapper with drug issues, in 'Squid Game 2'.
  • His performance was met with harsh criticism from various media outlets upon the series' release on December 26.
  • He stated that the character is meant to be a caricature and not a typical cool rapper.
  • T.O.P expressed that filming scenes involving drug addiction was personally challenging.

“I have to endure everything and accept it humbly.” — T.O.P

“Thanos was not supposed to be a flashy or cool rapper, but a failed, hip-hop loser character.” — T.O.P

T.O.P's portrayal of Thanos aimed to reflect a ridiculous and pathetic character, contributing to the comic relief in the dark narrative of the series.
newTitle: T.O.P Responds to Criticism of His Acting in 'Squid Game 2'

title: Sudip Pandey, Bhojpuri cinema heartthrob, dies of heart attack - Hindustan Times
summary:
Bhojpuri Actor Sudip Pandey Passes Away from Heart Attack

Date: Jan 16, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Sudip Pandey, a prominent figure in Bhojpuri cinema, died of a heart attack on Wednesday morning. His unexpected death has shocked fans and family alike.

  • Sudip Pandey died due to a heart attack at the age of 30.
  • He passed away in Mumbai at approximately 11 AM.
  • Pandey was known for both acting and producing in the Bhojpuri film industry since 2007.
  • He gained fame through films such as Pyar Mein, Balwa, and Dharti.
  • His death has elicited emotional responses from fans on social media.
“RIP...may your soul rest in peace,” a fan wrote on social media. “Gone too soon,” another social media user expressed.

Pandey's career achievements have left a significant mark on Bhojpuri cinema, and he will be remembered for his contributions.
newTitle: Bhojpuri Actor Sudip Pandey Passes Away from Heart Attack
